org.activebpel.rt.bpel.server.engine.receive
Interface IAeBPELReceiveHandler

All Known Implementing Classes:
AeAbstractReceiveHandler
public interface IAeBPELReceiveHandler

Interface detailing the abstract methods required of pluggable receive handlers

Method Summary

          Maps fault data from the BPEL engine to a protocol-specific response

Method Detail

mapInputData

public IAeMessageData mapInputData(IAeProcessPlan aPlan,
                                   AeExtendedMessageContext aContext,
                                   IAeWebServiceMessageData aData)
                            throws AeBusinessProcessException
Maps element data from a request into a AeMessageData object using information in the process plan and message context.

Parameters:
aPlan - process plan for service
aContext - MessageContext
aData - Raw Input data
Returns:
input converted to AeMessageData
Throws:
AeRequestException
AeBusinessProcessException

mapInputData

public IAeMessageData mapInputData(IAeProcessPlan aPlan,
                                   AeExtendedMessageContext aContext,
                                   org.w3c.dom.Document[] aDocArray)
                            throws AeBusinessProcessException
Maps element data from a request into a AeMessageData object using information in the process plan and message context.

Parameters:
aPlan - process plan for service
aContext - MessageContext
aDocArray - array of documents containing raw request data
Returns:
AeMessageData mapped from input documents
Throws:
AeRequestException
AeBusinessProcessException
